title: Hyundai Venue Overview
text: The Hyundai Venue is a compact SUV starting at Rs 7.94 lakh (ex-showroom Delhi). It comes with 1.2L Petrol, 1.0L Turbo Petrol and 1.5L Diesel engines.

title: Venue vs Tata Nexon
text: Tata Nexon is priced from Rs 8L. Venue offers more connected features and ADAS in top trims, while Nexon has 5-star GNCAP safety rating.

title: Venue vs Maruti Brezza
text: Brezza starts at Rs 8.7L, offers petrol/CNG options. Venue has premium feel and more tech features, Brezza offers lower running cost.
